definition: early evening/wedding night/(fig.) first sexual encounter

sentences.english: It allows both partners to keep their virginity intact for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 它保證了伴侶雙方初夜之前都是處子之身。

sentences.english: I lost my virginity at 17 to my high-school girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我17歲的時候將初夜獻給了高中女友。

sentences.english: This will be their first time, so we are just rubbing it on their lips.
sentences.chinese: 這可是他們的‘初夜’，在嘴脣上塗一點就行了。

sentences.english: I've come to claim the right of prima noctes.
sentences.chinese: 聽着，我來行使我的初夜權。

sentences.english: One thing is true, you never do forget your first time.
sentences.chinese: 但有一件事是肯定的，你不會忘記你的初夜。

sentences.english: Today, I lost my virginity to my amazing boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我把初夜交給了我的男友。

sentences.english: Droit de seigneur they had when there is a custom that is new peep.
sentences.chinese: 他們過初夜時有一種風俗就是偷看新房。

sentences.english: In the end what made Yihong left his wife in first night wedding?
sentences.chinese: 到底是什麼原因讓義宏在新婚初夜離開妻子？

definition: to break the hymen/to lose virginity
to lose one's virginity/to lose one's chastity
to have sexual relations with sb/to have dealings with
